mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.picture AS "picture", a.price AS "price", a.recommend AS "recommend"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM wx_food a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_food( id, type, name, picture, price, recommend ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{picture}, #{price}, #{recommend} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_food SET type = #{type}, name = #{name}, picture = #{picture}, price = #{price}, recommend = #{recommend} WHERE id = #{id}
